snippet: Portland will flush millions of gallons of treated water because a 19-year-old was caught urinating on Wednesday into an open reservoir.
abstract: Portland, Ore, will flush millions of gallons of treated water because a 19-year-old was caught urinating into an open reservoir.
lead_paragraph: Portland will flush millions of gallons of treated water because a 19-year-old was caught urinating on Wednesday into an open reservoir.

headline.main: Oregon: Water Supply to Be Discarded Over Urine in Reservoir
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Water Supply to Be Discarded Over Urine
